techmeme.title: The Pentagon renews a contract with SpaceX to provide Starlink internet services in Ukraine until November 30 at a cost of $14.1M (Anthony Capaccio/Bloomberg)
WhatsApp updates calling by increasing the limit for video calls to up to 32 people, and adding screen sharing with audio support and a speaker spotlight tool (Jagmeet Singh/TechCrunch)
Donald Trump met ~12 bitcoin mining executives, and posted that he wants "all the remaining Bitcoin to be made in the USA" to help the US be "energy dominant" (MacKenzie Sigalos/CNBC)
Oracle plans to shut down Oracle Advertising, after the ad business' revenue declined to ~$300M in the company's FY 2024, down from a reported $2B in FY 2022 (Catherine Perloff/Adweek)
After a major leak of unannounced games, Epic releases an update "so third-party tools can't surface any new unpublished product titles" from its Games Store (Aernout van de Velde/Wccftech)
